description: An infostealer malware campaign has reportedly collected millions of logins from users of various gaming websites, including players that use cheats, pay-to-cheat services. [...]
title: Activision: Enable 2FA to secure accounts recently stolen by malware

description: Today, Red Hat warned users to immediately stop using systems running Fedora development and experimental versions because of a backdoor found in the latest XZ Utils data compression tools and libraries. [...]
title: Red Hat warns of backdoor in XZ tools used by most Linux distros

description: U.S. users have just a few more days to make the transition from Google Podcasts as the company moves forward with the process of discontinuing the service globally. [...]
title: Google Podcasts service shuts down in the US next week
